name: Magicshine MOH 55 Aquila Pro 4000 Lumen Helmet Light
categories: MOH 55 Aquila Pro 4000 Lumen Helmet Light
description: See exactly where you’re going, not just where the bike is pointing. A powerful helmet mounted light changes the night-riding game. Pumping out 4000 lumens, the Aquila Pro carves a tunnel of light out of the dark. There's a mode for every part of the ride, from slow climbs, to flowing single track and flat-out descents. And, the USB powered battery pack is easy to charge, making “good enough” batteries a thing of the past.5 levels: 100%, 50%, 25%, 10% and flash. Light locks into lowest setting when power is 5% or less.Hybrid mode combines spot (28º spread) and flood (102º spread)Run times: 4000 lumens (2.25h), 1500 lumens (6.3h), 600 lumens (20.3h) and 100 lumens (89h).Tiltable head aims light where you want it.Single button control: easy to use with gloves on and remembers last mode used.USB rechargeable 10,000mAh battery tucks in your pack or jacket.Battery doubles as a USB powerbank (5V, 2A output).4-level LED battery status works when charging or in use.Machined aluminum housing with integrated heat sink reduces heat build up.IPX6 weatherproofing keeps light shining in heavy downpours.Integrated Garmin ¼-turn mount and GoPro mount gives you options to use existing mounts.
